q1: What do you think of Nigeria's uniforms now?
q2: Nigeria keeps getting better each World Cup cycle. Someday they will have the right players in the right positions and will be a real threat in both group play and elimination rounds.
q3: How far will Nigeria go next Cup?
a3: I hope far, underdogs should win more
q4: Who could Nigeria take from Brazil to improve them?
a4: They should take Neymar and Marcelo
